rule_text;: deny traverse on nodes (dev:Device) where dev.compromised = true to security;
grant create on nodes (f:File) where f.owner = $uid to user;
grant modify{price} on nodes (prod:Product) where prod.category = "Electronics" to supervisor;
grant traverse on nodes (e:Event) where e.doctor_id = $doc_ID to doctor;
deny delete on nodes (p:Patient) where p.critical = true to nurse;
grant delete on nodes (p:Patient) where p.critical = false to nurse;
grant modify{status} on nodes (r:Request) where r.level > 0 to admin;
deny modify{status} on nodes (r:Request) where r.flag = true to admin;
grant traverse on nodes (t:Task) where t.priority = "high" OR t.deadline < "2025-01-01" to manager;
deny traverse on nodes (t:Task) where t.priority = "high" AND t.blocked = true to manager;
grant add{amount} on nodes (tr:Transaction) where tr.valid = true to accountant;
deny add{amount} on nodes (tr:Transaction) where tr.fraud = true to accountant;
grant modify{grade} on nodes (s:Student) where s.year >= 1 to teacher;
grant modify{grade} on nodes (s:Student) where s.year >= 3 AND s.program = "CS" to teacher;
deny modify{grade} on nodes (s:Student) where s.suspended = true to teacher;
grant traverse on relationships (en:ENROLLED_IN) where en.semester = "S2" to registrar;
grant modify{email} on nodes (u:User) where u.active = true to support;
grant delete on nodes (acc:Account) where acc.balance > 0 to operator;
grant add{balance} on nodes (acc:Account) to operator;
grant delete on nodes (p:Project) where p.status = "Active" to manager;
grant modify{status} on nodes (p:Project) to manager;
grant delete on nodes (d:Document) where d.owner = $user to editor;
grant add{owner} on nodes (d:Document) to editor;
grant delete on nodes (r:Report) where r.confidential = true to intern;
grant remove{confidential} on nodes (r:Report) to intern;
grant delete on nodes (e:Event) where e.type = "Login" to auditor;
grant add{type} on nodes (e:Event) to auditor;
grant delete on nodes (t:Task) where t.priority = 10 to worker;
grant remove{priority} on nodes (t:Task) to worker;
grant delete on nodes (n:Node) where n.created_at > n.updated_at to admin;
grant modify{created_at} on nodes (n:Node) to admin;
grant modify{updated_at} on nodes (n:Node) to admin;
grant delete on nodes (a:Asset) where a.cost > 1000 to finance;
grant add{cost} on nodes (a:Asset) to finance;
grant remove{cost} on nodes (a:Asset) to finance;
deny modify{tag} on nodes (f:File) to admin;
grant add{tag} on nodes (f:File) to admin;
grant remove{tag} on nodes (f:File) to admin;
grant delete on nodes (c:Customer) where c.phone = "Private" to agent;
grant modify{phone} on nodes (c:Customer) to agent;
deny modify{email} on nodes (u:User) to admin;
grant add{email} on nodes (u:User) to admin;
grant remove{email} on nodes (u:User) to admin;
grant delete on nodes (emp:Employee) where emp.level > 3 to hr;
grant modify{level} on nodes (emp:Employee) to hr;
grant create on nodes (u:User) where u.role = "guest" to visitor;
grant add{name} on nodes (u:User) where u.level = 1 to visitor;
grant create on nodes (p:Post) where p.status = "draft" to editor;
grant add{content} on nodes (p:Post) where p.status = "draft" to writer;
grant create on nodes (c:Comment) where c.flagged = false to member;
grant add{text} on nodes (c:Comment) where c.flagged = false to member;
grant add{likes} on nodes (c:Comment) where c.flagged = false to member;
grant create on relationships (r:REPLIED_TO) where r.length < 10 to member;
grant add{timestamp} on relationships (r:REPLIED_TO) where r.length < 10 to member;
grant create on relationships (f:FRIEND_WITH) where f.since > 2019 to user;
grant add{since} on relationships (f:FRIEND_WITH) where f.since > 2019 to user;
grant create on nodes (t:Tag) where t.popularity > 5 to editor;
grant add{label} on nodes (t:Tag) where t.popularity > 5 to editor;
grant add{popularity} on nodes (t:Tag) where t.popularity > 5 to editor;
grant create on nodes (g:Group) where g.private = true to manager;
grant add{visibility} on nodes (g:Group) where g.private = true to manager;
grant create on nodes (a:Article) where a.type = "news" to author;
grant add{title} on nodes (a:Article) where a.type = "news" to author;
grant add{summary} on nodes (a:Article) where a.type = "news" to author;
grant create on relationships (l:LIKES) to user;
grant add{weight} on relationships (l:LIKES) to user;
grant create on relationships (v:VIEWED) where v.count < 10 to analyst;
grant add{count} on relationships (v:VIEWED) where v.count < 10 to analyst;
grant create on nodes (n:Notification) to system;
grant add{message} on nodes (n:Notification) to system;
grant create on nodes (s:Session) where s.active = true to admin;
grant add{token} on nodes (s:Session) where s.active = true to admin;
grant create on relationships (o:OWNS) to owner;
grant add{share} on relationships (o:OWNS) to owner;
grant create on nodes (r:Report) where r.status = "open" to auditor;
